Articles.Content:
Greetings fellow KSP'rs.

I have been away from KSP for a while now. I am proud to introduce a very nice plane I have designed.

Carrying around 4500 payload of petrol...this superb plane can get you where you want to be around Kerbin.

Powered by 6 turbo jet engines....no extra SAS needed and a high service limit...this plane is what your looking for. Want to pick up a lost kerbalnaut? Simply choose this baby to do the job.

Oh yeah...she can also carry another ship on her back...and has been tested to carry the largest fuel tank available in stock! (The big orange one!).

Enjoy it!

If your interested send me a pm for the download.

https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=342480825895607&set=a.342480755895614.1073741827.218605898283101&type=3&theater

https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=342480799228943&set=a.342480755895614.1073741827.218605898283101&type=3&theater

https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=342480815895608&set=a.342480755895614.1073741827.218605898283101&type=3&theater

Why don't you get something like imgur (totally free) and display the pics here o the forum? Some people won't click the links.

BTW, how many parts does it have?
+1 for imgur uploaded images. I personally never go to Facebook links if I can help it.
Thanks for your replies! Did you check it out tho? What do you think? Nice plane right?
Imgur or Imageshack, either or will do the job.
